Blog.post: Ahh finally the weekend a time for relaxing but i will do that later, today has been pretty fun there has been a very relaxed atmosphere in lessons today. Physics was fun having a water fight (again) while using a big electric thingy... hmm not really a good idea now was it meh nevermind of course i had to use the big electric thing (it's like one of thosse things which make your hair go up) so I am holding on to it while evryone was touching me... ;) causing me to get electric shocks and then playing cards in our german lesson instead of revising was a good idea. ah well a relaxed day comes to an end. See ya Dan :) Current mood: Happy but thirsty Current music: Linkin Park - In the end

Wow bloging is contagous a friend says I have inspired him to start a blog. So have a look at it when you have finished with mine it will give you an insight of the same day I had but through someone elses eyes. urlLink Joe's Blog Current mood: Hungry Current music: Jamiraquai - Little L

Wow today has been really weird it has been a fun day but I am actually very tired but I have done nothing at all, all day there has been the potent smell of eggs around school (probably because so many people brought eggs in for someone) luckily I did not get caught in any of the crossfire and I do not believe I am going to say this but biology was fun... Yes fun?!? Well I suppose it was better than the rest of the day because there was a bit of a water fight going on nothing to big but it helped pass the time on. That was the fun part of the day the bad part is I am really tired from doing nothing ah well... Just a question why does a person I thought I was a good friends with seem to ignore me and pretends I am not there??? Hmmm maybe I should say something instead of waiting for her to... Current mood: Tired Current music: Daniel Bedingfield - Friday

Wow the 3rd post today just to let all you nice people know that we have a counter so let me introduce you... counter - person person - counter Now you are acquainted with each other you can now forget entirely about him or you could sit and watch the numbers change (hopefully) I think this is it for today... or maybe not well we will see Current mood: Happy Current music: Lost Prophets - Last train home

Well I am one step closer to the completion of the blog; we now have a voting station. (Can a blog ever be complete?) *Shrugs* This is just one of hopefully many additions to the blog Please vote on the current poll it will make it better for all... honest Current mood: Relaxed Current music: Stereophonics - Everyday I think of money

Well today has been an odd day really I found out that I have to retake an exam I have already passed?!? and that i can not get into a geography A level course because my timetable is too full. Ah well no worries at least I know that i have the I.T. course at college sorted so that will be fun, i can't wait for next year to be honest you know starting 6th form college it's gonna be fun. Anyway time to go now think i may go play football with some mates, I aint decided yet so see you all around Current mood: Lazy Current music: U2-Elevation

Today is the start of an era after long debates with myself I finally decided to make my first blog. unfortunately there will be no pictures for a bit... Well until I get a digital camera but that shouldn't be long. Anyway a bit about me I am a male student from England just about to start my G.C.S.E's (so I suppose in a perfect world I should be revising instead of doing this but still this ain't a perfect world now is it...)I am into rock music and anything that the radio decides to churn out, if I think there is anymore information needing adding about me I will add it. I hope to add at least one post a day or if I have the time I will add more but we will see. Current mood: Chilled Current music: Coldplay
urlLink Do not worry people I am just testing some picture uploading software so this is a little tester

Well the first of my G.C.S.E's has been completed and the first of three business studies exams I think I did alright in it, it was not the easiest of exams or the longest but it was ok. Thats about it for now really so... See ya Dan :) Current mood: Relaxed Current music: PPK - Resurection

Sorry it has been a while since I posted last but bin slightly busy with my first G.C.S.E tomorrow and going to Alton towers yesterday, just to say if you do go to Alton towers... how can I put this hmmm ah I know... GO ON SPINBALL WHIZZER it is well worth any wait trust me. Hey ho time to go (hey that rhymed wow) See ya Dan :) Current mood: Relaxed Current music: Train - Drops of Jupiter

Hey everyone, I had a good day today it was a relaxed day today really I suppose it's because I only have tomorrow to do at school and then I leave on study leave, it feels kind of strange though I want to finish but it seems that I have not bin at high school long enough ah well, I think now I will get some food and just chill and then sleep so... See ya Dan :) Current mood: Relaxed Current music: Lost Prophets - We are Godzilla you are Japan P.S. I am now going to open the comment section of the blog to the general public just encase anyone has the sudden urge to post.

Due to technical problems with the polling station all votes have been reset... Sorry about this but it seems a little gremlin was in there and should now be sorted out so please re-vote. Sorry for any inconvenience Ah well I think I will go play some football with some mates now so... See ya Dan :) Current mood: Sporty Current music: U2 - An cat dubh

Hey everyone sorry about not posting yesterday never got round to it... Well this is the first ever post before 4 o'clock I do not know if that is an achievement but meh never mind. Just to let you all know there is another potentially good blog coming up from "Bushman" so have a look at his blog urlLink here That’s about it for now see ya all later Dan :) Current mood: Relaxed Current music: Bon Jovi - Bad Medicine

Hello everybody, Today was a slow day after a religion exam I had 3 or 4 hours to kill until a German exam so some friends and I just wondered round school then downtown and then had an hour or so spare which we filled by playing... Frisbee it passed the time anyway and after my German exam we played a bit of football for an hour (my shoulder is hurting even more now) ah well I think tomorrow I'll have a lie in and then see if I can be bothered to go up school even though I do not need to. That’s about it now so see ya Dan :) Current mood: Tired Current music: Stereophonics - Handbags and gladrags
Well I decided to put a tag board thing on the blog just to make the blog slightly better not a lot more to say. See ya Dan :) Current mood: Bored Current music: Nickelback - Hero

Argh I am just so bored there is just nothing to do most of my friends are probably at school either taking exams, in lessons, messing around at school or at home but I don't know which, plus I am just so damn stressed is this making me more bored I dunno just so many exams to do I wish I didn't have to do these bah ah well I will just struggle on. Dan :) Current mood: Bored and Stressed Current music: OPM - Heaven is a halfpipe

Well today has been a relaxed day really I did not do much apart from watch the Grand Prix I suppose I didn't do much because I ache from playing 3 hours of football yesterday my shoulder aches like mad but hey ho... not alot else to say really so... See ya Dan :) Current mood: Sleepy Current music: Eiffel 65 - Blue (da ba dee)

Hey all Well today has not been very interseting I haven't done alot apart from re-install Half Life on my pc and played on that a bit but otherwise I have done nothing, ah well I'll see what tommorrow brings. See ya Dan :) Current mood: Tired Current music: Gorillaz - 19-2000

Hey all I know it has been a while since my last post but I have been very busy and on holiday but nevermind, well here we are the first of june which is the official opening of my blog and if I am lucky it now should be on some search engines I aint sure though. Thats about it for now so see ya Dan:) Current mood: Relaxed Current music: Maroon 5 - Harder to breath Oh don't forget England are playing Japan today so I may put score and card updates on the blog.

Hey, So how's everyone doing... I'm fine thanks The past couple of days have been a bit boring as I have no exams or it's the weekend but still I seemed unsettled I cannot concentrate one one thing for long or I just do not get started on doing something it's damn wierd. Ah well, today is the start of the football tournament Euro 2004 with these fixtures today: Portugal v Greece 1 (0) v 2 (1) Spain v Russia 1 (0) v 0 (0) I will try and get updates on these matches when possible, thats about it for now. See ya Dan :) Current mood: Relaxed Current music: U2 - "40"

Hi all Jeez it's hot (and thats not just me... yeah right) well today has been fun in a sort of kind of not really way (does that make sense meh ) I had an exam in the morning and one in the afternoon whic I lost intrest in who needs biology any way so after I decided to play football argh big mistake it must be about 25°C and I'm running around damn I'm a fool ah well thats it for now. See Ya Dan :) Current mood: Tired Current music: Train - Calling all angels

Hi all, Well the past couple of days have been different in comparison to each other Saturday I saw England beat Iceland 6-1 woo hoo but today (Sunday) has been fairly slow and boring ah well... Oh by the way what is the title of The Matrix theme tune I know it was done by The Prodigy but I do not know what it was called, any help would be much appreciated. Thanks. See ya Dan :) Current mood: Relaxed Current music: Darude - Sandstorm

Hey all, There is going to be a break in updates until at least the 22/06/04 because there are a few things that I need to sort out and they need a lot of time and effort, and I have my exams even though they are ending now but... well I need time away from everything really it is starting to get way too much now and carrying a weight on your shoulders for 5 months now with added pressure is starting to take it's toll on me so I will see you all in a week or so. See Ya Dan :) Current mood: Tired Current music: Stereophonics - Rooftop

Hey, Well today I ain't done too much just chilled and waited for the football but something inspired me to download a BBC desktop blob thing this thing burps, farts, you can play games with him and you can turn him on with a click of your mouse... Now he is screaming so I will delete him... bye bye Anyway more football today with: Croatia v Switzerland England v France Oh by the way sorry if I am going on a bit about football and you do not like it do not worry there is only another 27 more games in the tournament after these. See Ya Dan :) Current mood: Relaxed Current music: Nickelback - Hero
This is a test as it appers my posts are not being added to the blog

Hello all, Yes I am back after my little rest and now I am feeling happy and relaxed, all my exams have finished, I have a job, and the blog can be found by google... wooo hooo Well I am happy I have a job, it should keep me entertained for a few weeks anyway. Try and guess where I am working... shop? ...bank? ...anything to do with something where I get paid or work long hours? Nope. I am working at school teaching younger kids electronics and helping them with the coursework I finished this year I aint getting paid but working about 6 hours a fortnight anit that bad now is it? If you live in England did you notice the flags hanging out of the windows of peoples houses and flying on peoples cars? and did you also notice when England lost the first game they all disappeared then England won the next two matches but they still disappeared in between? why not just leave them up? Ah well they are out now and all the hype is over for another two years... Just to say I am not fully English I am a quarter Irish as well so sometimes there may be a change of perspective between they are out and we are out so it all depends what mood I am in at the time. Just one more paragraph that is football related I promise... I want to ask anyone who reads my blog and who is not from England do people in your country smash up their own pubs and shops just because their team lost a sports match? Ah that’s about it now normal service will be resumed from now on. See Ya Dan :) Current mood: Relaxed Current music: Wierd Al Yankovic - Amish paradise

Hey all, Just a little question when you enter the blog do you get greeted with an advert? If so can you tell me what the advert is either by e-mailing me, putting it on the tag board or leaving a comment at the end of this post. Thanks. Not much else to say yet so... see ya Dan :) Current mood: Tired Current music: Lost Prophets - For sure

Hey all, Well the past couple of days have been fun and a laugh firstly yesterday I went shopping for an Mp3 player or a mini disc player, I didn't realise they cost so much but I finally settled on a couple of albums being: Train - Drops of Jupiter Lost Prophets - The fake sound of progress Then there was today firstly I had to go to work so I met up with Oaky and we both headed off to work, and when I had finished that it was about 11:20am so we decided to go up Perry's house (which Craig and Jamie were already at "jamming") so after a rendition of a R.H.C.P song we decided to recruit Darrell and a PS2 controller (we didn't need the controller in the end) so with six people there we decided to do what most people would do... Yeah you got it, have a tournament on Fifa 2004 (well what else did you think we were going to do...?) so after the best part of 4 hours, two pizzas and a lot of shouting, screaming and laughing later we had a winner... ME ...yay? What did we do after that well, we recruited Sam and played football in real life and that's about it for today so far. So see ya... Dan :) Current mood: Relaxed Current music: Train - Mississippi

Hey all, The last few days have been wasted really I've done nothing at all apart from going shopping again yesterday otherwise I have done nothing, I really should be putting these days to good use like improving my guitar playing or something fun, like tomorrow is that sport relief thing I wanted to take part in that all you have to do is run a mile (or walk) so why haven't I got myself round to applying and then getting over to where one of the runs are. And talking of applying I should really be on the look out for a job for over the summer holidays. Ah well, that’s about it for now See ya Dan :) Current mood: Blank Current music: Train - Hopeless

Hey all, Well the last few days have been o.k. it was Oaky's B'day a couple of days ago so happy birthday to him. I may also have a new job this one will be a job I get paid for so I am looking forward to that, but got to go to an interview thing on Monday for it and I also have an interview for 6th form on Monday too so that will be an interesting day, that’s about it for now. Hey all, Well you probally have noticed they layout of the blog has changed a couple of times over the past week mainly because I didn't like the way it was begining to look and I had other ideas such as putting Babelfish on my blog so it can be viewed in other languages but it seemed not to work and it also seemed out of place. Well that's that done... Today has been fairly fun... from what I can remember of it I went to work and did an extra lesson helping and then went back home, I have been tired today it's my fault really staying up late a couple of days ago and then last night going sleep to be woken up by my phone going off, which after that I struggled to get back sleep, so I think the rest of the night holds rest for me ready for work again tommorrow. See Ya Dan :) Current mood: Exausted Currnet music: The verve - Bittersweet Symphony

Hey all, Well the past couple of days have been fun especially yesterday where I went on a bike ride with Perry, Oaky, Sam and Craig we did about 25 miles (give or take) I worked out it took us about 5 hours (give or take) which I suppose is not bad especially for me who hadn't been on a bike for about 3-4 years before so I am pretty happy about that. Of course I am still aching my knee the most but meh nevermind. Today I have not really done much apart from rest and appaently tommorrow is my birthday (already?) yes I will finally be 16 (yay?) it kind of sucks being one of the youngest in the school year nevermind though, well thats about it for now... See Ya Dan :) Current mood: Tired Current music: Lost Prophets - Five is a four letter word

Hey all, Well today has just been one of those days, first off I had to go for my job interview, which I think went O.K. they said that they will get in contact with me about the job if the two other people who applied before me do not like it... So that was interesting and later on I had to go to school to get my timetable for the start of September, when I got it I had half of my lessons missing from it, damn lack of communication between the college and the school... ahh well at least they have put me in for a subject I did not enrole for it's a course called "Critical thinkin"... as soon as this got described I thought "oh great it's another English course!" well I was not that far off what it is, is looking at some text and describing it!?!? I suppose I shouldn't complain really because it is an examinable course so I now have the possibility of gaining 4 A (S) level's (I have no idea what A levels and AS levels I am in for but hey ho) that’s about it for now, see ya Dan :) Current mood: Tired Current music: Coolio - Gangsta's paradise

urlLink Me testing out my new digital camera, some new photo album thing should be appearing soon with photo's coming as soon as possible. Dan :) Current mood: Amused Current music: Lost prophets - A thousand apologies

Hey all, Well the storm arrived yesterday (48 hours late) but it arrived and lasted around 3 hours so that ment nothing that uses the mains could be used, which ment I was bored even more, anyway. Soon I should be going to the cinema to see... Garfield the movie YAY!!! I don't care if people think it's babyish or I'm sad because I'm going to see it because it looks really funny so it will be worth it, thats about it for now See Ya Dan :) Current mood: Relaxed Current music: Stereophonics - Is yesterday tommorrow, today?

Hey all, Well yesterday I went to Barry's didn't do much really he just showed me some of his console games and told me how and why he brought them... So yeah that was yesterday now I am sitting writing this kind of bored really, the worst thing is it's hot and sunny out but all my friends have dissapeared, so if anyone wants to talk or anything just AIM me or email me (all details are in my profile) please. More intresting and thoughtful update to come... See ya Dan :) Current mood: Bored Current music: Daniel Bedingfield - Gotta get thru this

Hey all, Well today has been a bit of a waste really mainly because of the weather being atrocious it has hardly stopped raining apart from a bit now but never mind, there is supposed to be a lighting storm comig soon so I may record a bit on my camera if it gets good. Tommorrow I am off up Barrys house for a bit so that should fun, dunno what we will be doing though... Oh and if any of you want to go to a cool message board thing click here... as far as I know it is a newly started up one so it's a bit empty at the moment, it ain't hosted by me but it seems to be picking up a bit of steam now so go and register aslong as you are polite I imagine the owner would be happy for you to stay... Well thats my bit of advertising done for today, thats about it for now. See ya Dan :) Current mood: Relaxed Current music: Nickelback - Breathe

Hey all, The last few days have gone ok really, I have mainly been job hunting seen as the orginal job I applied for seems to be well taken so I now have an application form for FOCUS so I will have to get that filled in and set off, the only slight downsides to this job are: 1) It's about a mile walk from home 2) I do not know how much I would get paid 3) I work all weekend 4) If I get the job it may stop a mate getting one at the same place... Thats about it for now, See Ya Dan :) Current mood: Relaxed Current music: Oasis - Stop crying your heart out
